description:
These boots are well-suited for extended adventures in sub-alpine terrain and other rugged trail systems. Flex zones and memory foam at the ankle keep your feet comfortable and secure when you're carrying a heavy pack. It's good to note that this is a more traditional design, constructed to last for many years, so it's advisable to schedule some break-in time with these boots. Once they've taken shape, they'll keep your feet happy for years to come.

  • Uppers are Sherpa HS12 full-grain leather for maximum durability and classic visual appeal
  • 37.5® lining moves sweat away from your feet
  • Full perimeter rubber rand protects the leather
  • Flex zone at the ankle adds comfort and a smoother break-in period
  • Memory foam ankle padding adapts to your foot for a secure fit
  • Dual-density polyurethane midsole has front and rear cushioning for a comfortable ride
  • TPU shank stabilizes feet on uneven terrain
  • Vibram® Biometric outsole is designed to let your foot roll naturally
  • Vibram XS Trek rubber and multi-directional lugs provide traction on steep and loose slopes
name: Scarpa SL Active Backpacking Boots - Men's
